text: The 2010 FIFA Puskás Award was the second FIFA Puskás Award. It was awarded on January 10, 2011, during the 2010 FIFA Ballon d'Or Gala in Switzerland. FC Bayern Munich player Hamit Altıntop was the winner of the award, for his goal against Kazakhstan during UEFA Euro 2012 qualifying. title: 2010 FIFA Puskás Award
